from oslo_serialization import jsonutils as json
from oslo_versionedobjects import fields
import six



[docs]class Json(fields.FieldType):

[docs]    def coerce(self, obj, attr, value):
        if isinstance(value, six.string_types):
            loaded = json.loads(value)
            return loaded
        return value



[docs]    def from_primitive(self, obj, attr, value):
        return self.coerce(obj, attr, value)



[docs]    def to_primitive(self, obj, attr, value):
        return json.dumps(value)




[docs]class JsonField(fields.AutoTypedField):
    pass




[docs]class ListField(fields.AutoTypedField):
    pass
